SEARCH
Package se.iths.java23.logic

Class GuessTheWord

java.lang.Object
se.iths.java23.logic.GuessTheWord
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuessingGame
public class GuessTheWord extends Object implements GuessingGame
Version:
1.0

GuessTheWord

GuessTheWord implements all the methods in the GuessingGame interface. In this game, the user should guess a 5-letter word with distinct letters.

Author:
Depinder Kaur

  • Method Details

    • generateNumberOrWord

      public String generateNumberOrWord()
      In this method, a list of 5-letter words is created. Then a random number is generated with the size of this list as its upper bound and a random word is selected from the given list.
      Specified by:
      generateNumberOrWord in interface GuessingGame
      Returns:
      A randomly selected word from a list of words.

    • checkResult

      public GuessEvaluation checkResult(String numberOrWord, String guess)
      This method returns a new Object of type GuessEvaluation which saves the number of correct positions and number of incorrect positions in the player's guess.
      Specified by:
      checkResult in interface GuessingGame
      Parameters:
      numberOrWord - This is the secret word chosen from the list of words.
      guess - This is the word guessed by the player.
      Returns:
      A new object of type GuessEvaluation.

    • showResult

      public String showResult(GuessEvaluation guessEvaluation)
      This method shows the number of the correct positions and incorrect positions of letters in the player's guessed word.
      Specified by:
      showResult in interface GuessingGame
      Parameters:
      guessEvaluation - This contains the integer values of the number of correct positions and incorrect positions.
      Returns:
      A String which shows the result of the player's guess.

    • isFinished

      public boolean isFinished(String guessResult)
      Returns a boolean depending upon whether the given argument matches the final goal. Note that if the argument does not match the final goal, the number of guesses increase by 1.
      Specified by:
      isFinished in interface GuessingGame
      Parameters:
      guessResult - It is a String of Bs and Cs which gets generated depending upon the player's input.
      Returns:
      True only if the given argument matches the final goal.

    • getNumOfGuesses

      public int getNumOfGuesses()
      Returns the number of guesses the player takes to guess the secret word.
      Specified by:
      getNumOfGuesses in interface GuessingGame
      Returns:
      The number of guesses.
